title: NAlertDialogProps
description: Neuron alert dialog component for confirmation actions. Requires explicit user response before proceeding, with confirm and cancel buttons.

title.description: Title text displayed in the alert dialog header.

description.description: Description text explaining what action the user is confirming.

confirmLabel.description: Text label for the confirm/action button.

cancelLabel.description: Text label for the cancel button.

open.description: Whether the alert dialog is open (controlled mode).

destructive.description: Whether the confirm button uses destructive styling to indicate a dangerous action.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
